title: High CPU on App Service
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reports intermittent high CPU spikes causing slow responses
msdfm_resolution: Scaled up plan and optimized code paths; enabled autoscale rules.

title: Storage Throttling
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer experiencing throttling errors during nightly batch upload
msdfm_resolution: Implemented retry with exponential backoff and upgraded to premium tier.
